# ARGeometryPrimitiveType.triangle

**Case**

Three vertices that connect to form a triangle.

## Declaration

```swift
case triangle
```

## Type of Connection

- **ARGeometryPrimitiveType.line**: A line segment in which a line connects two vertices.

items.description: A line segment in which a line connects two vertices.
